Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 2 Attack: D: 5 Spell DC: D: 13
Spells:
Cloudkill (D5 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (D4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Cure Wounds (D1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+1 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Druidcraft (D0 Tran): R30' Predicts 24 hr weather, causes a plant to bloom, creates a minor sensory effect, or lights or snuffs a small fire
Faerie Fire (D1 Evoc): R60' Objects in a 20' cube glow, giving foes advantage on attacks (save Dexterity negates), for concentration up to 1 min
Flaming Sphere (D2 Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Fog Cloud (D1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Freedom Of Movement (D4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Gaseous Form (D3 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (D4 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Hold Person (D2 Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Insect Plague (D5 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (save Constitution half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Longstrider (D1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tran): Self steps into rock, losing sight and muffling hearing but allowing casting spells on self, for up to 8 hr [R]
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 2d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 2d8 HP and ends the spell
Scrying (D5 Divi): Self sees and hears a chosen target (save Wisdom, modified by degree of familiarity, negates for 24 hr) for concentration up to 10 min
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Held club inflicts +5 magical attacks and 1d8+1 HP damage for 1 min
Speak With Plants (D3 Tran): Self can talk with and command plants for 10 min
Spider Climb (D2 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Tran): Touched can crawl on walls and ceilings for concentration up to 1 hr
Spike Growth (D2 Tran): R150' 20' radius becomes difficult terrain and inflicts 2d4 HP per 5' movement for concentration up to 10 min
Stinking Cloud (D3 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of actions (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Stone Shape (D4 Tran): Reshapes touched 5' cube of stone
Stone Shape (D4 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Tran): Reshapes touched 5' cube of stone
Thorn Whip (D0 Tran): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 2d6 HP and pulls a Large or smaller target 10'
Water Walk (D3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can traverse liquids for 1 hr [R]
Web (D2 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (save Dexterity negates and Strength frees) for concentration up to 1 hr; burning the web inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Magic Notes:
Bonus Cantrip (Circle Of The Land): Knows an additional Druid cantrip
Circle Spells: Has access to terrain-specific spells
Natural Recovery: Can recover 5 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the druid spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1 creature for 5 hr 2 times per short rest
